mapper.select: select productNo, categoryName, productName, PRICE, STOCK from product
select p.productNo as productNo, p.categoryName as productCategory, p.productName as productName, p.PRICE as productPrice, p.STOCK as productStock from product p where productNo=#{productNo}

select p.productNo as productNo, p.categoryName as productCategory, p.productName as productName, p.PRICE as productPrice, p.STOCK as productStock from product p, category c, category c1 where c.pcategory_no = c1.category_no and p.categoryName = c.NAME and c1.name = '${category}'
